jobs.title: Operations Rockstar - COO
jobs.description:
The COO will be responsible for helping to keep the daily operation of the business under smooth control. We’re looking for a candidate who is process driven, has a great attention to detail and is willing to turn their hand to any task.

*You’ll be managing a lean, agile international team, making sure the business is run well and the team is happy. 

*Reporting into the CEO, you’ll be responsible for ensuring the company is set up for success, setting and meeting their goals and targets 

*You’ll lead all operational matters, from building budgets to devising and implementing best-in-class processes as we scale 

*Working closely with the Product, Engineering, Marketing leaders devising and supporting growth strategies and the analytics that power them.

About You:

*You’ll have some experience managing people, budgets and data and will be as comfortable leading presentations and doing 360 feedback reviews as you are owning a P&L 

*We’re looking for a structured problem solver and strategic thinker who is results focused 

*You’re hot on data and love analyzing and testing what’s working and what’s not. You iterate quickly should experiments fail 

*You’re great with people and comfortable hiring and developing cross-functional teams.

What’s in for You?

*Opportunity to make a significant impact on a growing international business with a clear mission and purpose to help the most innovative startups in today's world.

jobs.title: Sales Superstar, Deal Closer
jobs.description:
The job is straightforward to explain – we need a constant pipeline of new business, your job will be to find and deliver it. 

We are looking for someone to come in and ramp up the sales pipeline across all territories. Ideally this person will be a self starter. Someone who thrives working autonomously, and is passionate about online marketing and startups.

You’ll be working very closely with the managing directors with the idea that your sales skills will be complemented by their technical knowledge. You’ll be expected to use your initiative and take responsibility for:

* Lead generation
* Nurturing of prospect relationships through to the conversion to client status
* Finding and submitting response to suitable tender opportunities
* Setting our strategy for acquiring new business


You will earn a percentage of the turnover for all new business you generate for the company. This will not be capped in any way. At start the renumeration will be based on performance. A base salary can be negotiated after a 3 month trial period.

About You:

You’ll have a proven sales track record, ideally in a marketing related company. Moreover you will be a natural salesperson:

* Your first instinct is to pick up the phone and call
* You find it easy to strike up a rapport with people
* You’re naturally upbeat and are aware sales is a numbers game
* You’re tenacious and hard working
* You’re constantly coming up with new ways to find business


Roles/Responsibilities:

* develop pipeline of customers from scratch
* manage supplier relationships
* manage customer experience
* help further develop service/website

Your heroic skills:

* Strong organization and time management skills
* 3+ years of extensive experience in Sales, experience in B2B 
* Outstanding communication skills with the ability to clearly present data, * context and implications at all levels of the organization
* Strong organization and time management skills
* Strong executional drive
* English is a must, any other additional language is a plus


We offer you:


* A dynamic, fast paced environment
* A team that wants to excel and make customers happy
* Collaborative environment with experienced colleagues
* Flexible and agile company with flat hierarchy

jobs.title: Blockchain Developer
jobs.description:
Hypergrowth is seeking an experienced Blockchain Developer who has solid expertise in system and software architecture, delivering scalable Enterprise software. The perfect individual will be confident and experienced with relevant full life-cycle architecture and software development capabilities. 


Job Duties and Responsibilities: 

* Must have broad and deep technical knowledge and passion for learning new technologies rapidly and independently
* Should have broad technical foundation and be able to understand network, operating system, database and application development design


Responsibilities:

* Design and build industry specific solutions using the Blockchain technology
* Contribtute to infrastructure setup and solution development in Blockchain and related technologies such as Ethereum, crypto currencies and smart contracts.
* Understand functional requirements as applicable to various industries and convert into system specifications for development.
* Define development approach and best practices to implement the solutions.
* Design and build Blockchain framework, accelerators and assets.
* Document development artifacts and best practices.
* Mentor team members, review code artifacts and provide technical guidance.
Requirements
* 5+ years of hands-on experience in Java/C#/Python/Golang.
* 3+ years' experience in application development and systems implementation.
* 1+ year experience in Blockchain research, understanding and solution development.
* Experience in NodeJS, GIT repositories, open source tools &technologies.
* Very good understanding of Blockchain technology, crypto currencies (Bitcoin or others), various consensus protocols.
* Experience in development on one of the Blockchain platforms like Hyperledger, Ethereum, R3 Corda, Ripple, Neo, 
* Experience in development of applications using distributed applications framework like Meteor, Multichain etc.
* Basic understanding of cryptography, symmetric/asymmetric (public/private key), hash functions, encryption/signatures.
* Experience with distributed systems and protocol design
* Experience with RDBMS, NoSQL or distributed databases
* Strong understanding of Algorithms and Data Structures
* Understanding of secure software development practices

jobs.title: Account Manager (Inbound Marketing & Growth Hacking Expert)
jobs.description:
About us:

Growth is a process and we can help making sense of it. From the freshest ideas on the frontlines of emerging technologies like AI, blockchain and the Internet of Things, to the companies shaking up traditional industries, we hack growth.

Our battle-hardened analysts, marketeers and technologists deliver data and metrics driven, content- powered and ROI-focused campaigns, and we don’t like to mess around. We’re in this for the long game: no quick-fixes, no shortcuts.

We’re an international team of serial entrepreneurs, product managers, digital marketeers, and finance professionals, all passionate about blockchain, digital marketing, startups and projects that matter.

About the role: 

The job is straightforward to explain – we need a blackbelt marketeer, growth hacker and inbound expert. 

We are looking for someone to help with the expansion and execution of our inbound digital, social media, SEO/SEM, and content marketing efforts. This is an excellent opportunity for someone who thrives in a high-energy environment and is looking to make an immediate and measurable impact. 2-3 years work experience in online marketing, inbound lead generation, managing social media, content writing for the web, social media, or email marketing for sales is a plus.

The position calls for someone with a “get it done” mindset who can manage multiple marketing-related tasks and work streams on deadline, including writing content used for marketing, creating inbound marketing campaigns, handling lead generation, managing social media content and accounts, analyzing marketing and web metrics and other key marketing initiatives that integrate into the companies marketing plan. The position also includes supporting the leadership and client service team with online research and other activities as needed.

You’ll be working very closely with the managing directors with the idea that your marketing skills will be complemented by their technical knowledge. You’ll be expected to use your initiative and take responsibility for:

- Driving traffic to clients website and generating leads with automated funnels
- Optimize and manage our inbound marketing automation and lead nurturing processes through email, content, and social media channels.
- Express complex technology through rich content and manage an editorial calendar that attracts a qualified audience to our business (including blog posts, videos, whitepapers, reports, infographics, email campaigns etc.).
- Implement appropriate analytics tools and to understand how our inbound marketing activity turns into customers, and continually refine our process to convert customers
- Work with creative team together to design visual elements
- Project Management and Key Account Management 
- Develop brand management and product marketing with managing directors
 

Qualifications:

- BA/BS degree or equivalent work experience.
- Fluent in English other languages are a big plus
- Strong copywriting and editing skills with an ability to write creatively, in broad and narrow scopes, with an informative, engaging style
- The ability to execute across a range of disciplines (digital, collateral, advertising, tradeshow/event management, etc.)
- Experience planning/executing digital marketing programs, tradeshow/events and product launches
- Proficient project manager with the capacity to work and collaborate with key business stakeholders across a range of skill levels.
- Able to manage multiple tasks and projects simultaneously
- Hubspot Certified
- Bonus skills: G-Suite, HTML/CSS, Adobe Creative Suite

The role is based in Sofia, Bulgaria

jobs.title: AI & Machine Learning Engineer - Semantic AI.
jobs.description:
We are looking for an AI/ML engineer to designs models for us for different initiatives and projects. 

Currently we need support to build a Semantic AI.

This is an entrepreneurial opportunity first!


Basic qualifications:

Bachelor's in Engineering, Computer Science, Math/Statistics, Physics, or related STEM Discipline (Master's Degree is a plus)
Proficient programming skills in Python, C/C++/C#, or MATLAB
Basic familiarity with machine learning methods and applications:
Supervised learning: Classification, regression, etc.
Unsupervised learning: Clustering, dimension reduction, generative modelling, etc.
Reinforcement learning: Model-based and/or model-free methods
Experience with versions control systems such as Git

Desired qualifications:

Solid understanding of linear algebra and numerical frameworks such as NumPy or related.
Familiarity with fundamental computer vision and/or signal processing techniques
Experience training and evaluating Artificial Neural Networks (ANNs), Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs), and/or Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs).
Experience using latest machine learning frameworks such as PyTorch, TensorFlow/Keras, etc.
Experience with CUDA or OpenCL is a plus
Experience working and collaborating in a research or development environment

Please share relevant experience.

jobs.title: Conversion Specialist
jobs.description:
We are seeking an experienced Conversion Optimization Specialist to join our team. As a Conversion Optimization Specialist at our company, you will be responsible for managing, testing and implementing conversion points in the marketing funnel. 

Duties and responsibilities
* Manage key conversion points in the marketing funnel
* Manage and optimize landing pages, website calls-to-action (CTAs), and lead-generating forms
* A/B test and continually measure the performance of CTAs
* Collaborate with teams responsible for blogging, email, social media, in order to optimize each conversion path
* Optimize our marketing’s conversion paths 
* Increase conversion rates and drive marketing-qualified leads for our sales team
* Optimize the lead-to-customer conversion rate
* Increase funnel marketing efficiencies

Requirements

* BA/BS or equivalent working experience
* Past experience with web analytics, A/B testing, and inbound marketing tactics
* Proficient using smart CTAs and smart form features to optimize for lifecycle stage and progressively profile our leads
* Good time-management skills
* Ability to multi-task
* Strong interpersonal and communication skills
* Critical-thinker and problem-solver
* Agile methodology experience
* Data Conversion experience

jobs.title: Head of Growth - Rockstar
jobs.description:
As the Head of Growth, you are a strategic marketer who wants to sit at the center of a high impact and world-changing marketing team. You will sit on the leadership team and manage your own small team.

As a strong and versatile business thinker, you will move fluidly from working with key cross-functional partners to diving deeply into complex issues facing our business to put together thoughtful point of views that advise and inform the CEO and the marketing leadership team.
Know the user. Know the magic. Connect the two. At its core, marketing at Hypergrowth starts with technology and ends with the user, bringing both together in unconventional ways. 

This means you will build a high growth engineering,  cross-functional and collaborative team of people who are highly-skilled, versatile, data-driven, and fearless.

Mindset:

- Growth Mindset
- Innovation
- Result driven
- Startup focused
- Ability to see and leverage everyday business events as content opportunities

Responsibilities

* Own day-to-day growth operations 
* Client and stakeholder management
* Development of world-class growth processes, lecurures and education
* Leading an international growth team, data science and machine learning team
* Ramping up new business oppurtunities and ventures
* Identify and develop key marketing operations processes to improve overall organizational efficiency and effectiveness.

Qualifications:
* Team management experience with an ability to work across teams and influence senior leaders
* Tolerance for ambiguity and ability to work in a fast-changing environment, with an entrepreneurial approach
* Operational rigor combined with excellent business acumen, problem solving, project management and analytical skills
* Long-term strategic thinking balanced with near-term execution skills and the ability to take complex data and distill them into a meaningful and coherent story
* Excellent verbal communication skills with peers, management, and cross-functional teams
* Executive-level written and visual presentation skills
* min 5 years of experience in Marketing or Strategy and Operation

jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.description:
Job Summary:

The Senior Product Manager will be responsible for building new products in an engaging,
functional way, and collaborating with internal and external stakeholders. The Senior Product
Manager has the knowledge and experience to function in an autonomous fashion with
minimal supervision to accomplish product goals. Deep understanding of the
customer and their workflow is key to this role.

Duties and responsibilities:
* Define the product strategy and roadmap
* Responsible for both product planning and product marketing
* Managing the product throughout the Product Lifecycle, gathering and prioritizing product and customer requirements
* Lead overall product development efforts for assigned product(s) with minimal guidance
* Identify and drive initiatives that will improve the product and impact the bottomline of the company
* Serve as a leader for the assigned engineering and design team (Product Team) and drive improvements for the team
* Leverage internal marketing, engineering, sales, and design teams to build and deliver new products to the market.
* Train internal sales and account management staff on features, benefits and market needs of new product
* Oversee the product’s life cycle and anticipate any problems
* Evaluate market competition and position the product line to target companies.
Work with Internal Sales and Account Management team to:
* Identify clients and set up meetings to discuss product roadmap
* Build a market segment profile for target prospects within our current client base
* Work with Engineering team to plan out features and tasks to support new improvements

jobs.title: Programmatic Media Buyer
jobs.description:
We are looking for a programmatic media buyer that has in-depth knowledge of algorithmic purchasing and optimization of ad campaigns. The ideal candidate will understand setting up the programmatic ad purchasing  KPI oriented persona, familiar with all media channels- Social, Display, Native, Email etc. 

Requirements:
* Previous hands on experience using a DSP is required, ideally Google’s solution
* Hands on experience setting up and running both social and programmatic campaigns (not outsourcing)
* Strong understanding of search, with hands on experience a plus
* Proven analytical thinking
* Proven ability to work with software/platforms
* Proven ability to work independently and multi-task: Effective time management skills – ability to prioritize and meet deadlines
* Detail-oriented with strong attention to follow-through
* Bachelor’s degree required
* 3 – 5 years’ experience required

Responsibilities:
* Builds programmatic media recommendations based on previous experience handling programmatic campaigns
* Maintains clients campaigns: project management, execution, reporting and communication
* Stay up to speed with the latest developments across algorithmic solutions within social and search
* Hands on ability to set bids, audiences and creative rotation directly within various platforms based on client needs (search, social, programmatic)
* Manages media buying-related technologies, including DSPs, DMP, and 3rd party ad servers
* Ability to target and track key prospects in local markets based on first and third party data segments
* Analyze performance to understand value provided by DSPs and other vendors
* Manage campaign pacing while recommending opportunities for optimization
* Regularly review results of campaigns across revenue, performance, and pacing
* Support real time bidding (RTB) optimization and strategy through ad-exchange media buying
* Purchase search, display, social media, and mobile advertising using various demand side platforms.
* Understand conversion tracking and how to optimize a campaign by analyzing that data exhaust to improve performance.
* Support training team members on campaign setup, optimizations, tactics and use of search tools, third party data and the development of writing and presentation skills
* Work closely with BI/Analytics to appropriately track and optimize campaigns

jobs.title: Sales superstar / Growth Hacking / Marketing Automation
jobs.description:
The job is straightforward to explain – we need a constant pipeline of new business, your job will be to find and deliver it. 

We are looking for someone to come in and ramp up the sales pipeline across all territories. Ideally this person will be a self starter. Someone who thrives working autonomously, and is passionate about online marketing and startups.

You’ll be working very closely with the managing directors with the idea that your sales skills will be complemented by their technical knowledge. You’ll be expected to use your initiative and take responsibility for:

* Lead generation
* Nurturing of prospect relationships through to the conversion to client status
* Finding and submitting response to suitable tender opportunities
* Setting our strategy for acquiring new business


You will earn a percentage of the turnover for all new business you generate for the company. This will not be capped in any way. At start the renumeration will be based on performance. A base salary can be negotiated after a 3 month trial period.

About You:

You’ll have a proven sales track record, ideally in a marketing related company. Moreover you will be a natural salesperson:

* Your first instinct is to pick up the phone and call
* You find it easy to strike up a rapport with people
* You’re naturally upbeat and are aware sales is a numbers game
* You’re tenacious and hard working
* You’re constantly coming up with new ways to find business


Roles/Responsibilities:

* develop pipeline of customers from scratch
* manage supplier relationships
* manage customer experience
* help further develop service/website

Your heroic skills:

* Strong organization and time management skills
* 3+ years of extensive experience in Sales, experience in B2B 
* Outstanding communication skills with the ability to clearly present data, * context and implications at all levels of the organization
* Strong organization and time management skills
* Strong executional drive
* English is a must, any other additional language is a plus


We offer you:


* A dynamic, fast paced environment
* A team that wants to excel and make customers happy
* Collaborative environment with experienced colleagues
* Flexible and agile company with flat hierarchy

jobs.title: Senior Growth Hacker
jobs.description:
Hypergrowth is a value-driven growth hacking collective. We're serial entrepreneurs, data scientists and marketer's obsessed about AARRR and next-generation businesses and startups. 

We love to accelerate technology startups and meaningful products across the universe.

Values: We believe in collaboration, processes and iterative optimization. We're a community of continuous learners and together we smash our client's goals. 

Our mission: we make marketing tangible for our clients and we help to establish a growth engine, which delivers business-relevant results. 

Our approach: we run a metric-driven growth hacking cycle to put our clients in front of their target audience. 

Our vision: let's help together entrepreneurs to build and scale outstanding organizations, which create a positive impact on a global scale.

At Hypergrowth, we're only working with the best, for our newest client projects we are looking for Growth Hacker Blackbelt's.

We're looking for you, if you're:
 
- a self-starter
- an entrepreneur
- a data fetishist 
- a relentless hustler
- an experienced growth hacker
- a team player 

If that sounds like you, please share with us in your application:

- your growth hacking process/framework
- your CV
- portfolio/track-record
- a case study
- your favorite book (fiction/non-fiction)
